info.title: Revolt Of The Binary Couriers
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
Revolt Of The Binary Couriers is the sequel to Pineapple Apocalypse RPG. Both the wiimote and classic controller are supported.

Controls:
Directional pad = Move
2 button = Accept (when using wiimote)
A button = Accept (when using classic controller)
+ or - = Pause and open the options menu

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
ThatOtherDev.com

music (Aeroplanes) by Nanodrone
